title: Beneath Spring's Rain
description: Miss Eliza Moore has fallen.Once a pursued heiress, now she's far worse than the poor relationâ€”vicious rumors have caused her to be cast out onto the streets. Lord Daniel Ashton has been in love with Eliza since his youth. When he learns she has been ruined, he races to save her by offering his hand in marriage.Eliza agrees to the marriage only to thwart the machinations of a lecherous villain. She doesn't trust anyone with her heart, not even a man with kind eyes and strong arms who claims to love her beyond reason.Will Daniel be able to help Eliza feel safe again after the betrayals of her life? Is he doomed to forever love his wife, but to never receive her love in return? Beneath Spring's Rain is a clean Regency romance with a threatening villain and closed-door intimacy between a married couple. Join Eliza and Daniel in their journey to happiness together.
author: Rebecca J.  Greenwood
